title: Sea bass with mussels and saffron
description: Sea bass simply fried to crisp the skin, served with a rich mussel and white wine sauce with a pinch of saffron - sure to impress!
ingredients: 4 portions wild sea bass, (about 140g/5oz each), pin boned
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 fennel bulb cut in half, cored and finely sliced
100g/3½oz samphire, picked and woody middle branch removed
